 

Virat and his teammates were playing a game . The game as as follows :
The teammates gave Virat a problem consisting of n integers of various values .  Virat had to find a subset of the given array  whose product ( all numbers multiplied together )  would give the minimum value possible .
Being a topper in school  Virat asks for your help !! Help Virat !!

 

Input

First will contain an integer n .
Next line  will contain n integers separated by a space .


Output
Find the output as required in the problem .

Constraints
1<=n<=9
-100<=integer<=100

Example
Input:
2
1 5

Output:
1
